0111000001011100 1011001101000010 1 -> sum: 0010001110011111, cout: 1

0111010000100111 1110000111010110 1 -> sum: 0101010111111110, cout: 1
0010011001001000 0010111010011001 1 -> sum: 0101010011100010, cout: 0
1011000100111110 1000011010110111 0 -> sum: 0011011111110101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
